content: Set the storage quota for users of this {{productName}}. User quota affects storage limit for the {{sectionName}} folder of each user.

comment.text: This translation key is used for the default storage quota description displayed to users when setting their individual quotas on a specific product in the portal settings. It appears as a subtitle within a mobile categories component and can be toggled to show or hide the quota details.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation uses a non-standard space before the first Arabic character in the first word "اضبط". This is usually avoided for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space before the first character of the word "اضبط".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'Bu' at the beginning of the sentence feels abrupt and doesn't flow naturally in Azerbaijani. It's more common to begin with a verb or a more descriptive phrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Təyin edin bu {{productName}} istifadəçiləri üçün saxlama kvotasını.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'saxlanma' is used for both 'storage' and 'retention', leading to ambiguity. It should be replaced with a more specific term for 'storage'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Təyin edin bu {{productName}} istifadəçiləri üçün saxlama kvotasını. İstifadəçi kvotası hər bir istifadəçinin {{sectionName}} qovluğu üçün yer limitinə təsir edir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '{{productName}}' and '{{sectionName}}' in the English content is replicated in the Greek translation. While technically not an error, it's preferable to replace these with the localized product and section names, as they are placeholders.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace '{{productName}}' and '{{sectionName}}' with the localized names for the product and section respectively. For example, if '{{productName}}' is 'MyProduct' and '{{sectionName}}' is 'Documents', replace those placeholders with 'Μου Προϊόν' and 'Έγγραφα' respectively (or their equivalent localized terms).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Սահմանեք այս {{productName}}-ն օգտատերերի պահեստային տարածքը" is not a direct and accurate translation of "Set the storage quota for users of this {{productName}}". A more accurate translation would be something like "Սահմանեք պահեստային քվոտան այս {{productName}}-ի օգտատերերի համար:" or "Սահմանեք {{productName}}-ի օգտատերերի համար պահեստային քվոտան".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Սահմանեք պահեստային քվոտան այս {{productName}}-ի օգտատերերի համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Օգտատիրոջ քվոտան ազդում է յուրաքանչյուր օգտատիրոջ {{sectionName}} թղթապանակի պահպանման սահմանաչափի վրա" could be improved for clarity. The current phrasing is a bit convoluted. A more direct translation of 'User quota affects storage limit for the {{sectionName}} folder of each user' would be 'Օգտատիրոջ քվոտան ազդում է յուրաքանչյուր օգտատիրոջ {{sectionName}} թղթապանակի պահեստային սահմանաչափի վրա:' or 'Օգտատիրոջ քվոտան սահմանում է յուրաքանչյուր օգտատիրոջ {{sectionName}} թղթապանակում պահեստային սահմանաչափը.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Օգտատիրոջ քվոտան սահմանում է յուրաքանչյուր օգտատիրոջ {{sectionName}} թղթապանակում պահեստային սահմանաչափը.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'ຄູາມາປອດໄສ' is a somewhat awkward translation of 'storage quota'. A more natural phrasing would be 'ກຳນົດຂີດຈຳກັດການໃຊ້ທີ່ກິນ' or 'ກຳນົດຈຳນວນທີ່ສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກຳນົດຂີດຈຳກັດການໃຊ້ທີ່ກິນ ສຳ ລັບຜູ້ໃຊ້ຂອງ {{productName}} ນີ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ມີຜົນກະທົບຕໍ່' is a direct translation of 'affects' and can be improved for flow and clarity. A better phrasing would be 'ສົ່ງຜົນກະທົບຕໍ່' or 'ກະທົບຕໍ່'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກະທົບຕໍ່ຂີດຈຳກັດການເກັບຮັກສາ ສຳ ລັບໂຟນເດີ {{sectionName}} ຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້ແຕ່ລະຄົນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The non-breaking space before 'lietotājiem' is unnecessary and may cause rendering issues. It should be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet krātuves kvotu šī {{productName}} lietotājiem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'limit' is repeated unnecessarily. While not strictly incorrect, it can be improved for readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustaw limit przechowywania dla użytkowników tego {{productName}}. Limit użytkownika wpływa na pojemność folderu {{sectionName}} każdego użytkownika.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Non-breaking space before 'para'. It should be a regular space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Defina a cota de armazenamento para usuários deste {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Stabiliți' (Set) is slightly formal and might not be the most natural choice. 'Define' or 'Configurați' might be more appropriate depending on the overall tone of the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurați sau Definiți

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'Cota de stocare pentru utilizator afectează...' is a bit clunky. A more fluent construction would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cota de stocare a utilizatorului afectează...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'Nastavite kvoto shranjevanja' which translates to 'Set storage quota'. However, it appears the target language should be Slovenian (not Sinhala, as implied by the name 'Sinhala Translation'). The English uses 'Set the storage quota'. Using 'Nastavite kvoto shranjevanja' is technically correct but not as natural-sounding as a more appropriate phrasing for Slovenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something more natural in Slovenian, such as 'Določite kvoto shranjevanja za uporabnike tega {{productName}}' or 'Nastavite uporabniško kvoto shranjevanja za ta {{productName}}'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'vpliva na omejitev shranjevanja' translates to 'affects the storage limit'.  While technically correct, a more fluent Slovenian might use a different phrasing. It's a bit stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to 'vpliva na največjo dovoljeno količino prostora' or 'omejuje količino prostora'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Nastavite' has a stray nbsp; character.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the nbsp; from 'Nastavite'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "Nastavte" is followed by a non-breaking space, which is unnecessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the non-breaking space after 'Nastavte'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Nastavite' is followed by a non-breaking space before 'kvoto'. This should be a regular space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavite kvoto

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'mapo' is preceded by a non-breaking space. This should be a regular space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: mapo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses Cyrillic script, which is appropriate, but the English template variables `{{productName}}` and `{{sectionName}}` should remain as such, and not be translated. The Serbian translation doesn't seem to have adapted the template variables.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the template variables `{{productName}}` and `{{sectionName}}` remain as-is within the Serbian translation. Verify they function correctly in the target application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'folder' is translated as 'фасциклу' (fasiklu). While accurate, 'фолдер' (folder) is a commonly used loanword in Serbian for 'folder' and might be more natural in this context.  'Фасцикла' is more aligned with a binder or file.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'фолдер' instead of 'фасциклу' for better readability and consistency with common usage. However, assess the specific tone and technicality desired.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'proizvoda' which is a valid word but sounds slightly formal in this context. It might be softened to 'produktu' for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Podesite kvotu skladišta za korisnike ovog produktu {{productName}}. Korisnička kvota utiče na ograničenje skladišta za fasciklu {{sectionName}} svakog korisnika.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the repeated use of 'kvota' can feel clunky. Consider slightly rephrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Podesite kvotu skladišta za korisnike ovog produktu {{productName}}. Količina skladišta koju korisnik koristi utiče na ograničenje za fasciklu {{sectionName}} svakog korisnika.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation includes unnecessary spacing before 'kullanıcıları' and 'klasörü'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu {{productName}} kullanıcıları için depolama kotası ayarlayın. Kullanıcı kotası, her kullanıcının {{sectionName}} klasörü için depolama sınırını etkiler.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "-" (em dash) is replaced with a space in the Ukrainian translation. This disrupts the flow and readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace the space after "Встановіть" with an em dash (—) to match the original English phrasing: "Встановіть—обмеження сховища..."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a non-standard spacing after 'Đặt' and before 'hạn ngạch'.  It should be more consistent with standard Vietnamese sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đặt hạn ngạch lưu trữ cho người dùng của {{productName}} này.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'hạn ngạch' is somewhat formal and might be replaced with a more common term depending on the target audience. Consider alternatives like 'giới hạn' or 'dung lượng tối đa'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đặt giới hạn lưu trữ cho người dùng của {{productName}} này.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'User quota affects storage limit' is somewhat awkward in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would better convey the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 用户配额会影响每个用户的{{sectionName}}文件夹的存储上限。
